content: knitted in one piece these mitts form a figure eight shape around the thumb by increasing in the first part of a row and decreasing in the second part the pattern includes illustrations concerning construction and topology a **danish version** was written by marianneho 1 and is available here http //strikkeglad dk/2009/ottetalsvanter/ 2 a **dutch translation** was provided by mijikke /people/mijikke and is available here 3 a video tutorial in **japanese** has been provided by kabosu かぼすの手しごと on youtube you can find it here part 1 4 and here part 2 5 renate schattschneider wwmaid 6 wrote **german versions** for this pattern * for fingering weight yarn http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/8-ern-wasser 7 * for sports weight yarn http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/alle-8-ung 8 renate schattschneider wwmaid 9 hat zwei deutsche versionen dieser anleitung geschrieben * für 4-fädiges sockengarn http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/8-ern-wasser 10 * für 5-fädiges garn http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/alle-8-ung 11 a **crochet version** of this pattern is also available on ravelry called octavo fingerless gloves 12 i was asked a few times about the yarn i used * for the green-blue ones i used a very cheap variegated sock yarn bought at a discounter in 2012 - it s listed here http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/vendita-sockenwolle colorway 555 * for the red-yellow-green ones i used schoeller+stahl fortissima mexiko 13 i guess noro sock would give similar results 1 https //www ravelry com/people/marianneho 2 http //strikkeglad dk/2009/ottetalsvanter/ 3 https //knitting-and-so-on blogspot com/2022/04/pieces-of-eight-mitts-in-dutch-gratis html 4 https //youtu be/vv4ipm7juha si=pggzsgnr0wl9algl 5 https //youtu be/ri-f_s7ial4 si=ppr0bohj3addrg_1 6 http //www ravelry com/people/wwmaid 7 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/8-ern-wasser 8 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/alle-8-ung 9 http //www ravelry com/people/wwmaid 10 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/8-ern-wasser 11 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/alle-8-ung 12 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/octavo-fingerless-gloves 13 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/schoellerstahl-fortissima-mexiko
